original: @327b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @327b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva, the great being, endowed with great compassion.

original: ma h'a te dze te dza ma ti dh'a ra n'i /
analyzed: ma h'a te dze te dza ma ti dh'a ra n'i /

original: shru ta dh'a ra ni; dza yanti bi dza yanti ma ti dh'a ra n'i sv'ah'a /
analyzed: shru ta dh'a ra ni; dza yanti bi dza yanti ma ti dh'a ra n'i sv'ah'a /

original: sman bra ma hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du @328a *//
analyzed: sman bra ma hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du @328a *//
translated: Take two parts of the medicine pramaha, grind it finely, mix it with milk, recite this mantra twenty-one times, and drink it for seven days.

original: 'thungs na / gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //🔽sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
analyzed: 'thungs na / gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'am /
translated: Without doubt, you will attain the power of memory.🔽Whether it is the Buddha's teachings

original: thos pa nyin zhag gcig la shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos pa nyin zhag gcig la shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
translated: you will memorize a thousand ślokas in a single day.

original: shloo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: shloo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī for memorizing a thousand ślokas is complete.
